items.sentence: Is there anybody else you\'d like us to notify?
It\'ll be difficult to finish doing this today.
It\'s OK to raise your hand and ask a question.
Was Tom telling the truth when he told us that?
Tom took a picture of Mary and sent it to John.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was a married woman.
The new restaurant on Park Street is very good.
Tom is the guy who knows everything about this.
I\'m going to my mother\'s house for Christmas.
I felt something important was going to happen.
